empower_statement: Kaigal empowers individuals to find purpose and thrive in their careers by matching talent with opportunities that align with their skills, passions, and aspirations.
download_app: Download the Kaigal app now to find numerous blue-collar job opportunities and kickstart your career!
easiest_way_find_job: The Easiest Way to Find Your Next Job
find_jobs_no_fee: Find jobs without paying a fee.
job_opportunities_directly: We bring relevant job opportunities directly to you.
connect_offline: Connect with Kaigal effortlessly, even offline.
explore_variety_jobs: Explore a variety of job options at once.
convenient_jobs_near_home: Find jobs near your home for convenience.
anyone_find_job: Anyone can find a job, regardless of experience or education.
trusted_top_companies: Trusted by top companies and countless workers for dependable job placements.
find_jobs_steps: 3 Simple Steps to Find Best Matching Jobs For You!
sign_up_options: Sign up using our Mobile App, send a message on WhatsApp, or give us a Missed call to get started!
share_skills_experience: Tell us your key skills, work experience, and preferred job roles so we can connect you with the best opportunities!
get_job_matches: Get personalized job matches delivered straight to you via WhatsApp, through IVR, or directly on the Mobile App!
select_job_apply: Select a job that interests you, submit your application, and get ready to start your new role!
connecting_jobs_across_india: From North to South, East to West, Kaigal is connecting people and jobs across India.
do_good_partnership: Do good to others, help Kaigal and also earn
partner_info: How Can I partner with Kaigal?
setup_partner_app: Download and set up the Kaigal Partner App to access partnership resources.
earn_rewards_refer: Boost your earnings by referring more individuals and earn rewards for successful engagements.
welcome_message: Welcome to Kaigal! Explore our community and discover what makes us unique in our videos.
product_billing_info: Everything you need to know about the product and billing.
kaigal_platform: Kaigal is a platform that connects blue-collar job seekers with companies looking to hire.
how_post_job: How do I post my job vacancies on Kaigal?
how_identify_candidates: How does Kaigal identify candidates for my job?
improve_chances_employees: How can I improve my chances of getting employees?
